text: â€˜â€˜(napiye!) Innirakarippavarkal (um'maip parri) ivar mitu ivarutaiya iraivani tamiruntu (nam virumpukiravaru) or attatci irakkappata ventama?'' Enru kurukinranar. (Napiye!) Nir accamutti eccarikkai ceykiravare tavira verillai; (akave, avarkal virumpiyavarellam ceyya ventuvatu umatu katamai illai. Ivvare) ovvoru vakupparukkum (oru) valikatti vantirukkirar
